 java.lang.String deleteComment()
          delete a particular comment (cstatusindi='D')
 java.lang.String execute()
          this method is called onclick of the welcome page tab it returns all the received, sent, and deleted comments for received comments uses the default pageNo=1 and noOfRecords=5

execute

public java.lang.String execute()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
this method is called onclick of the welcome page tab it returns all the received, sent, and deleted comments for received comments uses the default pageNo=1 and noOfRecords=5
